name: ProdMaster CLI
description: A CLI tool leveraging AI to streamline product management for tech founders and engineers.
architecture: React (Ink), TypeScript, Node.js, OpenAI GPT API
context: ProdMaster CLI is a command-line interface tool designed for tech-savvy product managers and founders of engineering startups. It combines the interactivity of React with the flexibility of command-line tools to offer intelligent product management capabilities. By using AI models via OpenAI's GPT APIs, it provides features like chat-based interfaces for task management, safety checks, and efficient file handling. With no reliance on a traditional database, the application is lightweight and focuses on in-memory and file-based data management, making it a versatile tool for modern product development environments.
